title: Minimum clinical attributes for positive or diagnostic cases

PatientID.description: A unique identifier for the patient. Should match the Patient ID DICOM tag (0010,0020) and anonymization processes.

Population.description: Categorization of the subjects in the dataset based on their status.

DateOfRadiologyDetection.description: Date when the tumor or lesion was first detected by imaging or nearest diagnostic study.

DateOfPathologyConfirmationOrDiagnosticD.description: Date when the tumor was histologically confirmed or confirmed by imaging.

AgeAtDiagnosisYears.description: Age of the patient at the time the tumor or lesion was confirmed.

PathologyConfirmationMethod.description: Method used to confirm pathology (e.g., histological biopsy or imaging for specific cases).

Topography.description: Location of the lesion, stratified in three steps: organ, region, and laterality.

Pathology.description: Histology and histological subtype of the lesion (ICD-O-3 if available).

ImagingProcedureProtocol.description: Specific protocol applied to obtain the radiology diagnostic image.

Treatment.description: Type of treatment received by the patient.
